Description: To verfiy that Customer Recharge is successful with only MSISDN and PIN.
To verfiy that Customer Recharge is successful if channel user is barred as Receiver.
To verify Customer Recharge is successful if channel user is insuspended.
To verify Customer Recharge is not successful if channel user is outsuspended.
To verify Customer Recharge is not successful if TCP of channel user is suspended.
To verify Customer Recharge is not successful if channel user is suspended.
To verify Customer Recharge is not successful if channel user is barred as sender.
To verify Customer Recharge not successful if PIN is missing.
To verify Customer Recharge not successful if PIN is invalid.
To verify Customer Recharge not successful if MSISDN2 is missing.
To verify Customer Recharge is successful if Selector is missing.
To verify Customer Recharge not successful if Amount is negative.
